name: Vital Voice & Data
tag_list: telecom, hosted-pbx, voip, msp, managed-services, telecommunications
overview:
Cutting telecom costs and managing telecom technology is our specialty. We guarantee our customers significant savings and back up our recommendations with post implementation project reviews. Our reviews are discount callsdesigned to show our clients that we came through on our proposed recommendations and projected deliverables. Any company can make empty promises…WE PROVE IT to you and work hard to continually earn your business!

By thoroughly reviewing your existing services, our auditors will find the telecom inefficiencies and will make recommendations guaranteed to BOTH lower your operational expenses and increase your communications efficiencies.

Furthermore, Vital Voice and Data will act as your telecom negotiator and work with multiple telecom companies to bring you the maximum amount of service for your dollar, ultimately reducing your overall telecom expenses for years to come.

In the fast-changing and complex telecom markets, full time professionals with deep knowledge of current and emerging technologies are needed in order to make the most cost effective decisions. We ARE your full-time outsourced telecom experts. Working as your telecom right hand, we provide, as needed, the following services:

  • Managed IT Services
  • Hosted PBX
  • Technology Consulting
  • Telecom Carrier Selection
  • Contract Negotiations
  • Internet Access Lines, VoIP, T1, DSL
  • Premise Wiring & Cabling
  • Website Creation
  • Internet Traffic Development
  • Single Point of Contact - Account Manager

www.vitalvoiceanddata.com
